com.xilinx.rapidwright.timing.delayestimator

Class DelayEstimatorBase<T extends InterconnectInfo>

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.timing.delayestimator.DelayEstimatorBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DelayEstimatorBase<T extends InterconnectInfo>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The base class to implement a delay estimator. Provide basic methods to build a customized estimator.
    See Also:
